description: Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include a rear dormer, 2 front roof lights and conversion of roof from hip to gable end. Change of use from Class C3 (Dwellinghouse) to Class C4 (House in Multiple Occupation). (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Use and Development)
decision_conditions: The dwellinghouse subject of this application was subject to planning application reference 17448/APP/2024/2861. Condition 6 of that consent removes permitted development rights for any enlargement, extension, improvement or alteration (including intensification and change of use) . The proposed development seeks to enlarge and extend the existing dwellinghouse as well as alter to the character to form a HMO which is also an intensification of the use of the site. As the dwellinghouse does not have permitted development rights for the proposed works, the proposed development is unlawful.
